entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with rain showers changing to flurries in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then west 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
